title: Dark Isle
description: Librarian's note: Alternate cover edition of ASIN B008IWO3H8.Sisters bound by love, separated by blood. . . And doomed to face the unimaginable.A new threat emerges as Chaos, an ancient deity, challenges not only the safety of the sisters, but the safety of the world. A decision must be made: do they save the ones they love, or save the world from total destruction? The lines between allies and enemies blur as the danger rises, leaving no one without suspicion.As the worlds of the Fae and human collide the future has never looked so grim. Or so damn impossible.
author: Shannon Mayer
